column5: I am in need of assistance from anyone in this area. I have a very close friend moving to Beaverton forr a job and she needs to find either a place to buy or rent. The ideal place will be within 1/2 hours of bBEaverton. Please PM or email me with any info!!

Rick I have a buddy living over that way I'll call him tonight and get him to ask around. He's been in the area a while knows quite a few people maybe he can come up with something.  PM me with the details on what they need or want in a place and I'll pass it on to him.  Mike
